title: Trivago CEO on State of the Travel Industry
itunes:title: Trivago CEO on State of the Travel Industry
description:
Axel Hefer, CEO at Trivago, discusses how the latest coronavirus lockdowns are impacting the travel industry.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
